articles.title: Wie die großen Meister unwissentlich zu Klimachronisten wurden
articles.image_title: Dust from the Sahara desert can be seen above Le Catogne mountain as seen from Verbier, Switzerland, Tuesday, March 15, 2022. A huge dust storm swirling over Europe from the Sahara desert made it hard to breathe in large parts of Spain for a second straight day on Wednesday and gave cleaning crews extra work as far away as Paris, London and Belgrade to remove the film of dirt falling on cars and buildings.Europeans woke up to eerie skies, from the grimy gray in Madrid to orange-hues in the Swiss Alps, caused by the tiny particles that had traveled thousands of kilometers across the Mediterranean Sea. (AP Photo/Melody Sky)

articles.image_title: 9-1917-12-15-A1-14-B (1674385) Brest-Litowsk/Trotzkij,Joffe,Altvater... 1. Weltkrieg 1914/18: Russisch-deutscher Waffenstillstand von Brest-Litowsk, 15. Dezember 1917, und nachfolgende Friedensverhandlungen. - V.r.n.l.: 'Trotzki, Joffe und Konter- admiral Altvater auf der Fahrt zu den Sitzungen.' - Dt. Pressefoto, um Dezember 1917; digital koloriert. E: Treaty of Brest-Litovsk / Trotzky, Joffe, Altvater / Photo. World War I (1914-1918); Russian-German armistice, Treaty of Brest-Litovsk on 15th December 1917, and consequent peace negotiations. - From left to right: Leon Trotzki, Adolph Joffe and Admiral Vasily Altfater (or Vasili Alvater) on their way to negotiations. - German press photo, c. December 1917; digitally coloured.

articles.title: Amerikas brillanter Taiwan-Schachzug
articles.image_title: (211231) -- BEIJING, Dec. 31, 2021 (Xinhua) -- Undated file photo shows the Chinese navy's Liaoning (L) aircraft-carrier receiving supplies during open-sea combat training. The Chinese navy's Liaoning aircraft-carrier formation returned on Dec. 30, 2021 to a military port in Qingdao, east China's Shandong Province, concluding 20-plus days of open-sea combat training. The exercise, which began on Dec. 9, took the formation into various waters, from the Yellow Sea to the East China Sea and the West Pacific, and has improved the formation's combat capability, according to an official statement. (Photo by Hu Shanmin/Xinhua)
